message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of secure information retrieval from databases, which is a topic in computer security (cs.CR). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT) in determining the capacity of the problem. The use of replicated databases and colluding servers suggests a connection to distributed systems (cs.DS) and databases (cs.DB). Finally, the consideration of different types of adversaries and their capabilities suggests a connection to cryptography (cs.CC).
